HeroSection.name: Dennis Vaga
HeroSection.description: I build modern web and mobile applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. I specialize in responsive UIs, AI-powered solutions, and smart integrations that deliver exceptional user experiences.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.paragraph1: I'm a full-stack web developer with 4+ years of experience building responsive, high-performing websites and web applications.
AboutMe.paragraph2: I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Next.js to create fast, SEO-friendly, and interactive web applications tailored to client needs.
AboutMe.paragraph3: My work spans from frontend development to backend logic and automation — focusing on AI chatbot integration, interactive user experiences, and smart data solutions with real-time capabilities.
AboutMe.paragraph4: I focus on building digital experiences that are not just functional, but thoughtful — helping businesses move faster, smarter, and with clarity.

MySkills.title: Skills
MySkills.description: These are the technologies I specialize in for building modern web applications.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently.

bodyfuelShop.title: BodyFuel Shop
bodyfuelShop.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform for fitness supplements built with Next.js, Express, and Prisma. Features AI-powered product discovery, secure authentication, and seamless shopping experience with advanced product variants support.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Complete online supplement store with product catalog browsing multiple categories including pre-workout, post-workout, protein powders, creatine, vitamins, and fat burners. Features intuitive shopping cart and checkout process.

aiChat.name: AI Product Discovery
aiChat.description: Intelligent chatbot powered by DeepSeek AI and Vercel AI SDK providing real-time product recommendations and streaming responses for enhanced customer experience and product discovery.

authentication.name: Secure Authentication
authentication.description: Robust authentication system using Auth.js with OAuth (Google) and email/password options, featuring role-based access control for customers and administrators.

productVariants.name: Product Variants
productVariants.description: Advanced variant system supporting multiple flavors, sizes, and formulations with real-time inventory tracking and dynamic pricing for each variant configuration.

bodyfuelAdmin.title: BodyFuel Admin
bodyfuelAdmin.description: Comprehensive administrative dashboard for managing the BodyFuel e-commerce platform, featuring advanced data tables, inventory control, order processing, and product management capabilities.

dashboard.name: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Complete management interface with quick actions for daily operations and responsive design optimized for desktop and mobile administration of the supplement store.

inventory.name: Product & Inventory Management
inventory.description: Comprehensive product management with variant support, category organization, and integration with AWS S3 for image management. Includes bulk operations and inventory tracking.

orders.name: Order Processing
orders.description: Advanced order management system with status tracking, detailed order views, and efficient data handling using TanStack Table for processing customer supplement orders.

bodyfuelBackend.title: BodyFuel API
bodyfuelBackend.description: Robust Express.js backend API powering the BodyFuel ecosystem with feature-based architecture, AI integrations, and comprehensive data management for the e-commerce platform.

api.name: RESTful API
api.description: Complete REST API with endpoints for products, categories, orders, authentication, and customer management. Features comprehensive error handling and data validation.

aiIntegration.name: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: DeepSeek AI integration for intelligent product recommendations and real-time chat responses. Implements streaming capabilities for instant user feedback.

architecture.name: Feature-based Architecture
architecture.description: Modern backend architecture organizing code by business capabilities rather than technical layers, ensuring maintainability and scalability for enterprise-level applications.

Contact.title: Let's Talk
Contact.description: Interested in working together? Have an interesting project in mind?
Contact.availabilityText: I'm currently available for new opportunities and projects
